 'description': 'The adoption solver resets the value of the delivery movement to the total of the values of related simulations. It eventually updates the delivery_ratio in the simulations.',

 'id': 'Adopt Solver',
 'solver_action_title': 'Replace value'},
 'FIFO Delivery Solver': {'type_acquire_local_role': 1,
 'content_list': [],
 'description': 'The FIFO solver reduces delivered quantity by reducing the quantity of simulation movements from the last order.',
